parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed or Unavailable Cruise Control Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed or unavailable repairs for the cruise control recall can lead to safety risks, as drivers may be unable to maintain a constant speed, potentially causing accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: lack of communication from Ford Motor Company or dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission solenoid can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to difficulty shifting gears, slipping, or hesitation, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission hesitates or slips when shifting gears
the transmission warning light comes on
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
the vehicle experiences sudden loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tread separation on the rear tires can cause loss of vehicle control, especially at high speeds, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Thumping or unusual noise from the rear tires
and/or visible signs of tire damage.
